body.name: ELYKEN Small Bookshelf, 3-Tier Bookcase with Metal Frame, Vintage Display Book Shelf, Freestanding Open Organizer Shelves for Office Study Living Room, Bedroom, Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 19 hrs 25 mins
features: 【Efficient Small Space Utilization】With 3-layered shelves measuring 11" x 16.4" each, spaced 12.9" apart, and standing at a total height of 32.2", open shelves and stable structure provide enough storage space, allowing you to show off your displays in every direction. Perfect for organizing books, family photos, potted plants, CDs, ornaments, and more.

【Anti-fall and Stability】 The fence is designed in the middle of the two compartments, so you don’t have to worry about items falling when using it away from the wall; the adjustable feet adapt to uneven ground surfaces, ensuring a stable display

【Sturdy and Durable Construction】Crafted with a wooden board and heavy-duty iron pipes, each layer is securely fastened to the frame using 4 screws, which can support up to 22 lbs (total weight capacity: 66 lbs), the anti-rust metal frame and screws guarantee long-term use

【All-match Design】The rustic brown top board beautifully complements the black metal frame, adding a touch of vintage style to your home decor; the open storage design not only showcases your items prominently but also facilitates easy access

【Easy to Assemble】 Book shelf parts with tools are packed in a full box, and every part has a label, please follow the illustrated assembly instructions to select the corresponding parts for proper assembly, and the instruction manual is comprehensible and helps you accordingly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, Sexy, Scalable and Easy to Put Together!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased one of these a while back and it was very easy to put together.Once I got it in position, for my liquor bottles (see video) everything fit very well and is an attractive addition to the room.What's nice is that you can easily get a second or third one etc... and scale whatever you're using them for to exactly how many you need. You can split them up in a room and do all different things with them. Honestly, I wish I just had like five more of these to put all over the place in my closets for storage and a few in the living room. They're so great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and attractive
reviews.reviewText: These shelves are very sturdy, very nice looking with the black trim and wooden shelves and the perfect size for the space it was intended for. I world certainly purchase another set if I needed one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, very sturdy, looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice shelf . . . but has a manufacturing defect
reviews.reviewText: Everything about the design and delivery of the shelf was great. It's super sturdy, has a small footprint (working great in the corner of the apartment living room), and only requires two Allen wrenches to assemble and they are included. The only negative is that the shelf I received has a manufacturing defect: The pre-drilled holes for one of the two horizontal stabilizing bars are reversed (the holes are toward the front of the side bracket instead of the rear). I'm an engineer and am certain about this. I thought I was going to have to drill the appropriate holes myself, but the support supplied by the wood shelfs provide more than enough strength and sturdiness, so I just let it go. So . . . a 5-star small shelf, deducting two stars for a clear defect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was fairly easy to put together. I like the look of the faux wood; not gaudy or anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good option for the price!
reviews.reviewText: A sturdy and great option given the price. The only drawbacks are that the metal is more of a metallic, glittery yellow rather than gold a some of the screws don’t fit as well as they should. Other than that, I was happy with the finished product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful, small bookshelf or nightstand. The wood is a nice color and the corner protectors during shipping were much more protective than I've seen on other furniture I've ordered. This was pretty easy to assemble and I love that the feet are screws on, so you can ensure that everything is level. We have an older home and the rooms aren't exactly square and the floors aren't exactly even in places. I love when furniture gives me the ability to level it without shims!We are using this under a TV in the office for the playstation. We have a PS4 and it fits perfectly on the top level. I was really surprised how wide and sturdy this bookshelf is. The kind of bookshelf that you'd keep for years to come and move with. It is open shelving, but you could put some nice baskets and it'd be beautiful in any room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for the classroom and it has become super helpful. The assembly was easy and relatively stress free. It stores all the papers and lessons for the week and keeps us organized.I would definitely recommend this.
